channel.title: Someone help please!
channel.description:
Okay, Now I am using insidiaX source, And I`m trying to change the client background and alerts sprite background. Whenever I replace it in the sprites folder of the client, It stays the same as the older picture. What else do I have to do?
Please help!

item.title: Someone help please!
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

Well my guess is that you have forgot about when the cache installs to your Local Disk (C:) you probably need to change those’s sprites as well.

Read full topic

item.title: Someone help please!
item.dc:creator: @ethanhello ethanhello
item.description:
@ethanhello wrote:

maybe your editing the wrong one…

Read full topic
